title: Camera locked bug
body:
Hey,

I've been having issues with the camera, and I was wondering if anyone had had the same problem and had found a way to fix it.

When I go into the game, and the camera is unlocked, when I move the mouse along the corner the camera won't move. The only fix is to finish the game, and reboot the client (and even that doesn't always work).

It is extremely annoying to play with a locked camera as I miss a lot of vision. 

I have played around with the settings, and in semi-lock, it does work when I move the mouse along the corner, but the champ has to be in-frame,when I unlock it again it doesn't work. 

I uninstalled the game, and re-installed it, and nothing, same problem.

I also read other threats and tried all suggestions: move the small icon beside the mini-map into the mini-map, use 'Y', etc... but nothing has fixed it so far.

Any suggestions?

Thank you

replies.body:
There may be an issue with your configuration here that's causing a problem with your camera interface.  The fix here would be to reset your configuration files, and not perform any file modifications afterwards:  

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

Let me know if you still have any issues after!

I'll give this a shot and get back to you!

Thanks for taking the time!

So it worked on the first game right after I deleted the file. The camera worked perfectly on unlocked.
However, once I started the second custom game I had the same issue.

So I am guessing that that is the problem, but the changes are not saving.

That's strange to hear, but we'd like to keep helping!  Send us a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can work with you.  We'll continue digging into this to find out what's going on!  We'll respond back as soon as we can!
Have you attempted clicking and dragging on the minimap?  I get this often and dragging along the minimap fixes

I have tried, but it doesn't seem to fix the issue. The camera jumps to wherever I click on the minimap, but then again, remains locked and I am not able to move it by moving the mouse along the corners.

Thanks for the suggestion, though!
